>>Weather Axalp

Generally, it is cold and temperate in Axalp. The precipitation levels in Axalp are noteworthy, as there is rainfall even during the most arid month. Köppen and Geiger classify this climate as Dfb. The mean temperature prevailing in the city of Axalp is recorded as 4.0 °C | 39.2 °F, according to statistical data. The annual rainfall is 2059 mm | 81.1 inch.

The specified area is located in the northern hemisphere of our planet. The onset of summer commences towards the conclusion of June and culminates by September. The season is characterized by a sequence of months, namely: June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month Axalp

Precipitation is the lowest in February, with an average of 116 mm | 4.6 inch. The month of July experiences the highest amount of precipitation, with an average value of 261 mm | 10.3 inch.

average temperature by month Axalp

At an average temperature of 13.6 °C | 56.5 °F, July is the hottest month of the year. The month of January is characterized by the lowest temperatures, which have an average reading of -5.5 °C | 22.2 °F.

It has been observed that November exhibits the highest relative humidity, with a percentage of 82.91. On the other hand, February experiences the lowest relative humidity at an approximate rate of 75.70. According to the data, July is observed as the month with maximum rainy days (20.33) while February has recorded minimum rainfall during its tenure (11.90).

Total hours of sun

Within the region of Axalp, the month that experiences a maximum number of daily hours with bright sunshine is July exhibiting an average duration of approximately 8.83. In totality, there are about 273.64 hours worth of sunlight throughout this particular period.

On average, the location of Axalp experiences the least number of daily hours with sunshine during January. The total duration of sunlight in this period is recorded as 150.59, while an average of about 4.86 hours are received per day.

Throughout the year, Axalp experiences approximately 2483.84 hours of sunshine. The average monthly duration of sunlight is estimated to be around 81.58.
